verses.name: Revelation 14:14
verses.text: And I looked, and behold a white cloud, and upon the cloud one sat like unto the Son of man, having on his head a golden crown, and in his hand a sharp sickle.

verses.name: Revelation 14:15
verses.text: And another angel came out of the temple, crying with a loud voice to him that sat on the cloud, Thrust in thy sickle, and reap: for the time is come for thee to reap; for the harvest of the earth is ripe.

verses.name: Revelation 14:16
verses.text: And he that sat on the cloud thrust in his sickle on the earth; and the earth was reaped.
